reviewText:
NOT HAPPY AT ALL

How good is a DVD that does not play ?
I contacted the seller and he told me that the DVD does not play in the USA,
this has to be one of my favorite films of all time. i have already watched it multiple times and i still get a laugh out of it and hear jokes that i hadn't heard before. amazing!
Very good movie, good actors and a lot action...Fernanda Montenegro is great, and the main characters are the best one ever, I don't see this movie being with another ones...
I'm very disappointed because I NEVER got my movie that I bought like 5 months ago, so what is up with that? Paid for it, but....oh well!!!

I LOVE THIS MOVIE....So what I didn't know is this  foreign  movie couldn't be seeing  on my regular  DVD,  has one  strange codification  just for South America....but I use my computer to see it.  Love the delivery, super-fast, great product. I really recommend this vendor...This is first time that I recipe one package that has in hand write THANK YOU, meaning to  me that she/he really care about me.....SO THANK YOU  FOR YOU TOO!!!
